author: mukulg
msg: made some fixes to XPath2 function fn:namespace-uri-from-QName (which is now able to look into the XPath2 dynamic context as well, to resolve namespace prefixes). ref Eclipse bug, https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=361721. this behavior is needed by one of XSD 1.1 test suite tests. committing related Xerces code base changes as well.
